canPlay(address).details: Checks if user has enough LINK sent to use the services. > 15 LINK in this specific case.

fundMySubscription(uint256).details: msg.sender sends LINK to the contract. and the LINK is evenly distributed among all Chainlink Services subscriptions.

getUserSubsBalance(address).details: Returns how much LINK user has deposited in the contract.

startFight(bytes32).details: This function must always be called by `FightMatchmaker`. It starts the fight execution process using Chainlink Functions requests.

documentation.text: @dev Params needed for intializing Chainlink Services.

@dev This function must always be called by `FightMatchmaker`.
 It starts the fight execution process using Chainlink Functions requests.
